description: Fresh From The War Chest ...Now, the DVD's second scene -- with Kasey, Brock and Gage -- was only originally planned to stream in the War Chest. There's a lot of juicy stuff in it that never would have made it onto a DVD under normal editing circumstances -- some goofing around with the guys and stuff, for example. So it's kind of a fun fly-on-the-wall treat for y'all.Back In The Day ...We filmed this scene at the old home place in NC where we had a really great time. We shot this scene one afternoon in Luke's old room -- many of you will recognize the bright orange walls. While we were shooting it, I thought about how great it would be to show you guys how a completely unedited scene like this looks.Down And Dirty ...The guys get down and dirty as everyone gets a taste of cock; Gage jerks Brock off to completion (which is something we've never done before) and both Gage and Kasey fuck Brock nice and hard and blow their loads all over him. Cheerleaders ...You're gonna be laughing your ass off as you hear Brock's commentary on the subject of getting fucked. The stuff where I allowed the camera to keep rolling (where I usually turn it off) is so funny. Gage decides he'll be the cheerleader while Kasey fucks Brock and Gage comes up with some hilarious cheers. This one is gonna have you all laughing and smiling from ear-to-ear.
title: Brock, Gage & Kasey
